snippet.title: Adventure Time: Pirates of the Enchiridion Trailer (USA)
snippet.description:
Available on Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®4, Xbox One™ and PC on July 17th, 2018 and July 20th, 2018 globally.

In this brand-new, hilarious Adventure Time story, gamers play as Finn, Jake, BMO and Marceline, to explore fan-favourite kingdoms, and meet the well-loved characters from Cartoon Network’s popular TV animation series. 

Adventure Time: Pirates of the Enchiridion Gameplay Features Include:
• Freely explore the Land of Ooo
• 3D visuals that match the art-style of the show
• Playable fan-favourite characters: Finn, Jake, BMO, and Marceline
• An original Adventure Time story, voiced by the series’ voice cast.
• Tactical combat
• Hero progression
• Pirates – “Shiver me timbers!”, including, as named by the fans, ‘Jeff’ the boat!

PRE-ORDER NOW: https://goo.gl/AtzcQd
